# portkey_prompt_partial (Data Source)

Use this data source to get information about a Portkey prompt partial.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Look up a prompt partial by slug
data "portkey_prompt_partial" "example" {
  slug = "system-context"
}

# Look up a specific version
data "portkey_prompt_partial" "latest" {
  slug    = "system-context"
  version = "latest"
}

# Use the prompt partial data
output "partial_content" {
  value = data.portkey_prompt_partial.example.content
}

output "partial_version" {
  value = data.portkey_prompt_partial.example.partial_version
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `slug` (String) The slug of the prompt partial to look up.

### Optional

- `version` (String) Version to retrieve: 'latest', 'default', or a specific version number. Defaults to 'default'.

### Read-Only

- `content` (String) The partial template content.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt partial was created.
- `id` (String) Prompt partial identifier (UUID).
- `name` (String) Human-readable name for the prompt partial.
- `partial_version` (Number) Version number of the prompt partial.
- `prompt_partial_version_id` (String) Version ID of the prompt partial.
- `status` (String) Status of the prompt partial (active, archived).
- `updated_at` (String) Timestamp when the prompt partial was last updated.
